lead_paragraph: LOS ANGELES - For years CBS has lagged behind other television networks in its inclusion of gay, lesbian and transgender characters. In the season that starts in September, however, a gay character will join "The Good Wife," a lesbian character will join "Rules of Engagement" and a gay character will appear in the new sitcom "$#*! My Dad Says."
snippet: The network is adding three characters because it wants to make its programs more inclusive, the CBS entertainment president, Nina Tassler, said.
abstract: The network is adding three characters because it wants to make its programs more inclusive, the CBS entertainment president, Nina Tassler, said.
